org.osgi.service.cdi

Class CdiEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osgi.service.cdi.CdiEvent

  • public class CdiEvent
extends java.lang.Object
    CdiEvents are sent by the CDI extender and received by registered CdiListener services.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CdiEvent.Type
      An enum defining the states of a CDI container.
